Extract baseline vital sign covariates from VS

Source: R/make_nif.R
baseline_covariates.Rd

Extract baseline vital sign covariates from VS

Usage

baseline_covariates(
  vs,
  baseline_filter = {
     TRUE
 },
  silent = FALSE
)

Arguments

vs

The VS domain as data frame.

baseline_filter

R filter expression to select the baseline time point.

silent

Switch to disable message output.

Value

Baseline VS data as wide data frame.

Examples

baseline_covariates(examplinib_sad$vs)
#> # A tibble: 63 × 4
#>    USUBJID           HEIGHT WEIGHT   BMI
#>    <chr>              <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 20230000011010001   187.   77    21.9
#>  2 20230000011010002   190.   72.8  20.3
#>  3 20230000011010003   175.   80    26.2
#>  4 20230000011010004   179.   73.4  22.9
#>  5 20230000011010005   168.   78.8  27.9
#>  6 20230000011010006   174.   89.5  29.5
#>  7 20230000011010007   172.   90    30.2
#>  8 20230000011010008   175.   81.5  26.7
#>  9 20230000011010009   185.   73.2  21.4
#> 10 20230000011010010   183.   77.6  23.2
#> # ℹ 53 more rows
